#yetify.js

Easy way for us &yet folks to add some flair to terminal output.

## Install
`npm install yetify`

## Use
```js
var yetify = require('yetify');

console.log(yetify.logo());
console.log(yetify.liftLogo());
console.log(yetify.andBangLogo());

yetify.logoTab(10);
yetify.liftTab(20);
yetify.andBangTab(30);
```
